description: Manage Azure Cosmos DB SQL triggers.

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql trigger create
commands.summary: Create an SQL trigger under an Azure Cosmos DB SQL container.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql trigger create --account-name
                               --body
                               --container-name
                               --database-name
                               --name
                               --resource-group
                               [--operation {All, Create, Delete, Replace, Update}]
                               [--type {Post, Pre}]
examples: az cosmosdb sql trigger create -g MyResourceGroup -a MyAccount -d MyDatabase -c MyContainer -n MyTrigger -b TriggerBody

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql trigger delete
commands.summary: Delete the SQL trigger under an Azure Cosmos DB SQL container.

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql trigger list
commands.summary: List the SQL triggers under an Azure Cosmos DB SQL container.

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql trigger show
commands.summary: Show the details of a SQL trigger under an Azure Cosmos DB SQL container.

commands.name: az cosmosdb sql trigger update
commands.summary: Updates an Azure Cosmos DB SQL trigger.
commands.syntax:
az cosmosdb sql trigger update --account-name
                               --container-name
                               --database-name
                               --name
                               --resource-group
                               [--body]
                               [--operation {All, Create, Delete, Replace, Update}]
                               [--type {Post, Pre}]
